trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Dabargar would have you avenge a fallen friend.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy guide.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_TODO_01<tab>Slay the beasts at the Shades of Grief.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy guide.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Dabargar.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_000<tab>Ah, the hero who brought low Valigarmanda. I would beg your aid in exterminating a new threat that has visited the Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_001<tab>One of our kin recently went missing, only to turn up just outside the ruins at the Shades of Grief...reduced to a desiccated corpse.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_003<tab>Judging from the wounds, the poor soul must have been fed upon by a particularly formidable bloodsucker. This fiend cannot be suffered to live!

TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_004<tab>To lure it out, we have placed blood-soaked meat at strategic locations around the ruins. One of my comrades is there now, and he'd doubtless be grateful for your assistance.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_005<tab>You'll find the Shades of Grief down the road to the northwest. Would you meet with my comrade and check on the trap we've laid?
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_010<tab>Gee hee hee... Ahem! Greetings, visitor!

TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_011<tab>You know the plan, yes? Well, there's a problem. Some <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> creatures have been drawn in by the smell of the meat, oh yes!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_012<tab>Yes, that despicable bloodsucker will never creep out from hiding so long as they're around! Yes, I'm afraid I must ask you to get rid of them!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_013<tab>Luckily, there is nothing our quarry loves better than fresh blood. The more of it, the better, oh yes!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_014<tab>I'll watch from a distance, yes? Once the creatures have been dealt with, come to the west side of the ruins. Hee hee...kee hee hee!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_020<tab>Gee hee hee! Finally. You must be so exhausted after all that dashing and slashing. As for me, I feel rather invigorated, oh yes!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_FAKEYOKFUY05049_000_021<tab>Why, I was practically counting the seconds...until I could drain your life's blood!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_POPMESSAGE_000_025<tab>The enemy reveals itself!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_030<tab>The bloodsucker was disguised as my comrade all along!? Surely that cannot be!

TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_031<tab>F-Forgive me, I know not what to say. If the fiend was possessed of such an alarming ability, I should think someone would have made mention of it before now!
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_032<tab>Years ago, the Head of Reason once speculated that the beasts we call bloodsuckers are in fact beings known as “voidsent,” come from another realm.

TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_033<tab>Others have even suggested they might be invaders from distant stars! I have heard many and more theories over the years, but perhaps I was unwise to shrug them off as I have.
TEXT_KINGZB109_05049_DABARGAR_000_034<tab>In any case, the threat is no more, and our village owes you a debt. Now, if you will excuse me, I must find my missing comrade!
